name: Canteen
notes: A modern New England summer shack and a gathering place in the center of Provincetown for the perfect summer meal.
serve fresh seafood, raw shellfish, specialty sandwiches and salads, housemade sausages and much more
Housemade desserts like banana beignets and lemon rosemary and lavender ice.

name: Fanizzi's
notes: Excellent seafood, oceanside views, and great service at a fair price
Top Recommendations: Fried Mac and Cheese, Pasta Fanizzi, and Cod Picatta
Offers casual waterfront dining.

name: Jimmy's Hideaway
notes: For those that just want a small meal to go with their drinks, there is a tavern menu that includes spicy BBQ pork ribs, the HideAway burger and shrimp Florentine

Vegetarians also have several options at Jimmy's HideAway, including the tofu wings that are fried in a house hot sauce and served with Bleu cheese, or the tofu Napoleon that is marinated and grilled with asparagus, Crimini mushrooms and gruyere cheese

name: Joon Bar
notes: Elegant New American cuisine served with ingenious wine pairings from its enormous collection
Most dishes come in a small and large size, so your party can choose to dine tapas-style if it wishes - and it probably will, because almost everything on the menu is worth a try
The fried Spanish olives are a must, as are the baby octopus salad, duck confit flatbread and Wagyu beef sliders.
Open year-round

name: Lobster Pot
notes: A Provincetown tradition to those visiting the Outer Cape, our two waterfront dining rooms provide the harbor view while our full menu, served all day, offers the finest & freshest in seafood, Portuguese specialties, steaks, poultry, vegetarian and light fare.
Cocktails served in the TOP of the Pot bar
Famous for our Bloody Mary's & Signature Drinks
Home of Tim's award winning Clam Chowder
ZAGAT Survey...Top Restaurants on Cape Cod.

name: The Landing
notes: Pilgrim House offers herb-infused, creative cocktails showcasing herbs from our garden as well as a careful selection of fine wines and craft beer.
A food menu of small plates, appetizers and desserts feature Cape Cod's finest ingredients from local farms and other food producers created by our acclaimed Chef Lucio Garnica and team.
On the water
Pet friendly

name: Far Land Provisions
notes: American, Cafe, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options
Massachusetts favorite corner store & deli featuring on-site bakery, prepared foods, and made to order breakfast and lunch sandwiches
Providing full-service catering for weddings, special events, and cocktail parties.
Check out our seasonal outpost at Herring Cove Beach that features fresh and innovative offerings in a one of a kind beach setting

name: The Mews
notes: Year in and year out, this year-round delight in Provincetown is a a dependable local's favorite.
Innovative, consistent New American menu.
Attentive staff in a beautiful dining room with sea views
Always difficult to get into so if you can't snag a reservation, try the bar (stocked with many brands of great vodka or the fun upstairs coffeehouse featuring open-mike nights.
